column1: 8 pts - Identified business function is somewhat unlikely to benefit from scrum/sprint. The explanation provided is detailed, but the chosen function may not be the best fit for scrum/sprint methodologies.

Rating: 8 pts

Comment: Good attempt at explaining scrum/sprint for the production process, but some significant explanatory content is missing. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt, but the explanation of why kanban is a poor fit could be more specific and clear.
10 pts - You clearly identified the marketing function as the one that could benefit the most from implementing kanban methodologies. Great job!

10 pts - Some vagueness in description, but largely OK. Good effort in explaining the implementation of Kanban in the marketing department, but could be more specific about the possible columns in the Kanban board.
8 pts: Complete and clear description of poor fit. Great job explaining the reasons why scrum/sprint is not suitable for the mold creation process. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying confirmation bias as a potential issue in the decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

8/10 - You provided a good definition of confirmation bias and explained its potential impact on the decision-making process. However, some parts of your response were not directly related to the definition of the bias. Keep up the good work!

Rating: 10/10

Comment: Good job on describing the possible problems and solutions, but some details could be clearer. Keep up the good work!
8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in explaining the concepts, but some parts are unclear and could use more detail. Keep up the good work!
